page.title: 05A day in the life of ....
page.content: The Gibbins family at Angel Farm get up at 7.15 a.m. Mr. Gibbins feeds the pigs, Debbie practises the piano and Andrew feeds the hens.They have breakfast and then the children go to school. Mr. Gibbins feeds more animals and Mrs. Gibbins does the housework. Then they have lunch. The children arrive home from school between 3.30 and 4.40 and watch TV for thirty minutes before home work. The family have tea together and the children go to bed; Timothy aged 9 at 7.30, Debbie aged 12 at 8.00 and Andrew aged 14 at 9.00. Mr. Gibbins looks at all the animals before going to bed at 10.30.
